title: Mutative Corruption
description: How the body and soul warp in the presence of excess distortion

data.senses: Blind to normal color. Can see kaleidoscopes across the infrared. -5 accurate handling anything that doesn't give off heat. Can see heat signatures even in total darkness.

data.body: Combust. 1d6 damage per turn until extinguished. All flammable equipment burns.

data.mind: Gain a random ability. Lose all unspent XP.

data.body:
Reassembled. Swap two attributes.
1d8 to determine (reroll on match)
data.mind:
Cascading loss. Roll 1d6 for each skill and ability.
On 3 or less, remove it.

data.senses: Sharpened by nightmares. 1d6 damage. Reroll Vigilant as 4d6 (max 18)
data.body: Reforged by warp. 1d6 damage. Add 1d6 to max Accurate, Discreet, Quick, or Strong (1d4 to determine).
data.mind: Unwavering focus. 1d6 damage. +1 to max Cunning (max 18)
data.shadow: Reborn in darkness. Remove all corruption. Change Corruption Threshold equal to Resolute. If it is ever exceeded, permanently lose control of the character.

data.senses: Incomprehensible. Reroll max Discreet and max Vigilant as 1d6.
data.body:
Inversion. 1d20+10 damage.
Reroll Strong and Quick as 1d6 if survived.
data.mind: Shatter. Reroll Cunning and Resolute as 1d6.
